revised_title: The Structure of Ionization Fronts in Interstellar Gas
tldr: The authors analyze the structure of ionization fronts in interstellar gas, providing a complete analysis of all types of ionization fronts and computed examples. They show that solutions for the propagation of ionization fronts can be made unique and discuss the importance of strong-type and weak-type ionization fronts. The study also examines the conflict with the Chapman-Jouguet hypothesis and the reasons behind this behavior.
